item.title: National Key Research and Development Programme
item.description: During his Ph.D., he participated in the National Natural Science Foundation of China’s key project “Open Source Software Trustworthiness Analysis and Assurance Methodology”.

item.title: National Key Research and Development Programme
item.description: During his Ph.D., he participated in the project promotion of the National Key Research and Development Program “Screening and Recommendation of Information Content for Susceptible Groups”.

item.title: National Natural Geoscience Project
item.description: During his master’s degree, as a technical backbone, he led four master’s students to participate in the application of this national nature project, and after this project was successfully declared, he participated in the project as the first student and completed an invention patent.

item.title: National Key Research and Development Programme
item.description: During his PhD, as a technical backbone, he led one doctoral student, six master’s students and five undergraduates to successfully complete the project advancement of the National Key Research and Development Programme ‘Research on Cross-queue Data Security Sharing Mechanism and Trusted Analysis Technology’.

item.title: Top-level Project in Yunnan Province
item.description: During his master’s degree, as a technical backbone, he led four master’s students to participate in the writing of this provincial special application, and after the successful declaration of this project, he participated in the project as the first student and published CNKI highly cited and highly downloadable papers one.

item.title: School Science and Innovation Project
item.description: As a project leader during his master’s degree, he led five master’s students to complete this university-level science and innovation project.
